mapper.select: SELECT snd702b.STDR_YM AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , snd702b.DPRT_CD AS dprtCd /* 부서코드 */ , snd702b.RGST_SN AS rgstSn /* 등록일련번호 */ , snd702b.RPTS_IEM_MNGM_NO AS rptsIemMngmNo /* 보고서항목관리번호 */ , snd702b.RLES_TOT_LOAN_INTR AS rlesTotLoanIntr /* 부동산총대출이자 */ , snd702b.RLES_TOT_LOAN_PAI_AMT AS rlesTotLoanPaiAmt /* 부동산총대출원리금금액 */ , snd702b.CPTL_RSTR_RT AS cptlRstrRt /* 자본환원율 */ , snd702b.NCR_RSK_VL AS ncrRskVl /* NCR위험값 */ , snd702b.NCR_RSK_AMT AS ncrRskAmt /* NCR위험금액 */ , snd702b.JOB_CHRR_NM AS jobChrrNm /* 업무담당자명 */ , snd702b.DPT_NM AS dptNm /* 부서명 */ , snd702b.CPLC_CTNS AS cplcCtns /* 연락처내용 */ , snd702b.HND_DETL_DTM AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , snd702b.HND_EMPNO AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , snd702b.HND_TMNL_NO AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , snd702b.HND_TR_ID AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , snd702b.GUID AS guid /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS702B snd702b WHERE snd702b.DPRT_CD LIKE #{dptCd} AND snd702b.STDR_YM LIKE CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS( SELECT s702b_1.STDR_YM FROM IBIMS701B s702b_1 WHERE s702b_1.STDR_YM = #{stdrYm} ) THEN #{stdrYm} ELSE #{prvStdrYm} END UNION SELECT /* , T.PRDT_LCLS_CD AS rptsCtrtTpCd 계약유형1 (유동성/신용공여형) = 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ /* , NVL(s002b_1.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_LCLS_CD_NM 기업여신상품대분류코드명 */ /* , T.PRDT_MDCL_CD AS rptsCtrtTpDetlCd 계약유형2 (매입약정 등) = 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ /* , NVL(s002b_2.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_MDCL_CD_NM 기업여신상품중분류코드명 */ /* , T.PF_LOAN_YN AS PF_LOAN_YN PF대출여부*/ NULL AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , NULL AS dprtCd /* 부서코드 */ , NULL AS rgstSn /* 등록일련번호 */ , NULL AS rptsIemMngmNo /* 보고서항목관리번호 */ , NVL( (SELECT MAX(B1.ENTP_HNGL_NM) FROM IBIMS114B B1 WHERE B1.BZNO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO), '') AS cmpNm /* 회사명 */ , NULL AS fssCmpCd /* 금융감독원회사코드 */ , NULL AS wrtnStdrDt /* 작성기준일자 */ , A.PRDT_NM AS prdtNm /* 계약명칭 */ , T.CTRC_DT AS ctrtDt /* 계약일 */ , T.CTRC_EXP_DT AS expDt /* 만기일자 */ , NULL AS rptsInvShpCd /* 보고서투자형태코드 */ , NULL AS rptsInvShpDetlCd /* 보고서투자형태상세코드 */ , NULL AS pfThcsDcd /* PF해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfTpDcd /* PF유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfSlltTpDcd /* PF분양유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfErnTpDcd /* PF수익유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS rlesTpDcd /* 부동산유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS bssAsstLctpDcd /* 기초자산소재지구분코드 */ , NULL AS rlesLctpZpcd /* 부동산소재지우편번호 */ , NULL AS lctpAddr /* 소재지주소 */ , NULL AS ntnNm /* 국가명 */ , NULL AS ovrsLctCtyNm /* 해외소재도시명 */ , NULL AS unsldThcsDcd /* 미분양해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS lmtLoanCtrcAmt /* 한도대출약정금액 */ , NULL AS loanBlce /* 대출잔액 */ , NULL AS brwrNm /* 차주명 */ , NULL AS brwrChrDcd /* 차주성격구분코드 */ , NULL AS brwrCrno /* 차주법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS rptsIntrtShpDcd /* 보고서금리형태구분코드 */ , NULL AS ctrcLoanIntrt /* 약정대출금리 */ , NULL AS nowLoanIntrt /* 현재대출금리 */ , NULL AS ovduThcsDcd /* 연체해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS ovduRsn /* 연체사유 */ , NULL AS loanExpXtnsThcsDcd /* 대출만기연장해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS loanExpXtnsRsn /* 대출만기연장사유 */ , NULL AS eprzCrdlInvAmt /* 기업여신투자금액 */ , NULL AS acivCrpNm /* 피투자법인명 */ , NULL AS acivCrpChrCd /* 피투자법인성격코드 */ , NULL AS acivCrno /* 피투자법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS parIntrRt /* 액면이자율 */ , NULL AS frsInvPotLtvRto /* 최초투자시점LTV비율 */ , NULL AS wrtnStdrDeLtvRto /* 작성기준일LTV비율 */ , NULL AS ltvOutputMthDcd /* LTV산출방법구분코드 */ , NULL AS aprsPrc /* 감정가격 */ , NULL AS totSlltAmt /* 총분양금액 */ , NULL AS jdgmTeamPrsmAmt /* 심사팀추정금액 */ , NULL AS pybkRankDcd /* 변제순위구분코드 */ , NULL AS rlesRentGrteAmt /* 부동산임대보증금액 */ , NULL AS prfdRankAmt /* 우선순위금액 */ , NULL AS sodrAmt /* 동순위금액 */ , NULL AS bkbnAmt /* 후순위금액 */ , NULL AS otcmCrdtRifcThcsDcd /* 타사신용보강해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS otcmCrdtRifcMnDcd /* 타사신용보강수단구분코드 */ , NULL AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpNm /* 1차신용보강회사명 */ , NULL AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpCrno /* 1차신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpCrdtGrdCd /* 1차신용보강회사신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpNm /* 2차신용보강회사명 */ , NULL AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpCrno /* 2차신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpCrdtGrdCd /* 2차신용보강회사신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS efceCmpNm /* 시행회사명 */ , NULL AS efceCmpCrno /* 시행회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS pfEfceShpDcd /* PF시행형태구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfBusiApvlStepCd /* PF사업승인단계코드 */ , NULL AS pfCsstStepCd /* PF착공단계코드 */ , NULL AS pfSlltStepCd /* PF분양단계코드 */ , NULL AS pfCnfnStepCd /* PF준공단계코드 */ , NULL AS totBusiAmt /* 총사업금액 */ , NULL AS rvnuAmt /* 매출금액 */ , NULL AS slfCpta /* 자기자본금 */ , NULL AS unSqmsSlltAmt /* 단위면적분양금액 */ , NULL AS mdwyGoldRdmpRto /* 중도금상환비율 */ , NULL AS allSqms /* 전체면적 */ , NULL AS estmEmrmRt /* 예상공실율 */ , NULL AS unSqmsEstmRentErnAmt /* 단위면적예상임대수익금액 */ , NULL AS unSqmsEstmRentCt /* 단위면적예상임대비용 */ , NULL AS estmPurBsnErnAmt /* 예상순수영업수익금액 */ , NULL AS pfStlnTotLoanAmt /* PF대주총대출금액 */ , NULL AS pfStlnPtciIsttNum /* PF대주참여기관수 */ , NULL AS pfStlnLoanExpDt /* PF대주대출만기일자 */ , NULL AS sq1StlnIsttNm /* 1차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq1StlnIsttCrno /* 1차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq1StlnLoanAmt /* 1차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq2StlnIsttNm /* 2차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq2StlnIsttCrno /* 2차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq2StlnLoanAmt /* 2차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq3StlnIsttNm /* 3차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq3StlnIsttCrno /* 3차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq3StlnLoanAmt /* 3차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq4StlnIsttNm /* 4차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq4StlnIsttCrno /* 4차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq4StlnLoanAmt /* 4차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq5StlnIsttNm /* 5차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq5StlnIsttCrno /* 5차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq5StlnLoanAmt /* 5차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS busiApvlRqsDt /* 사업승인신청일자 */ , NULL AS landPchsRt /* 토지매입율 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnCfrmThcsDcd /* 책임준공확약해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnCfrmIsttNm /* 책임준공확약기관명 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnCfrmIsttCrno /* 책임준공확약기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnEprzCrdtGrdCd /* 책임준공기업신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS csucCmpNm /* 시공회사명 */ , NULL AS csucCmpCrno /* 시공회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS csucCmpEprzCrdtGrdCd /* 시공회사기업신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS csstDt /* 착공일자 */ , NULL AS cnfnDt /* 준공일자 */ , NULL AS plnFairRt /* 계획공정율 */ , NULL AS excFairRt /* 실행공정율 */ , NULL AS slltRt /* 분양율 */ , NULL AS slltOpngDt /* 분양개시일자 */ , NULL AS moinRt /* 입주율 */ , NULL AS exitSlltRt /* EXIT분양율 */ , NULL AS dvrSqms /* 전용면적 */ , NULL AS dvrSqmsUnAmt /* 전용면적단위금액 */ , NULL AS rentPsblTotSqms /* 임대가능총면적 */ , NULL AS emrmRt /* 공실율 */ , NULL AS unSqmsRentErnAmt /* 단위면적임대수익금액 */ , NULL AS unSqmsRentCt /* 단위면적임대비용 */ , NULL AS sq1YrlyPurBsnErnAmt /* 1차연간순수영업수익금액 */ , NULL AS sq2YrlyPurBsnErnAmt /* 2차연간순수영업수익금액 */ , NULL AS rlesTotLoanIntr /* 부동산총대출이자 */ , NULL AS rlesTotLoanPaiAmt /* 부동산총대출원리금금액 */ , NULL AS cptlRstrRt /* 자본환원율 */ , NULL AS ncrRskVl /* NCR위험값 */ , NULL AS ncrRskAmt /* NCR위험금액 */ , NULL AS jobChrrNm /* 업무담당자명 */ , NULL AS dptNm /* 부서명 */ , NULL AS cplcCtns /* 연락처내용 */ , NULL AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , NULL AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , NULL AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , NULL AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , NULL AS guid /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ , ( SELECT T1.PRDT_CD , T1.CTRC_DT , T1.CTRC_EXP_DT , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액*/ , T1.PF_LOAN_YN /* PF대출여부*/ , T1.PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , T1.PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ , SUM(T2.DEAL_EXC_BLCE) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 약정잔액 */ FROM IBIMS401B T1 /* 딜약정기본 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN IBIMS402B T2 /* 딜실행기본 */ ON T1.PRDT_CD = T2.PRDT_CD AND T2.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.EPRZ_CRDL_LDG_STTS_CD = '1' GROUP BY T1.PRDT_CD , T1.CTRC_DT , T1.CTRC_EXP_DT , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액*/ , T1.PF_LOAN_YN /* PF대출여부*/ , T1.PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , T1.PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ ) T LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_1 ON T.PRDT_LCLS_CD = s002b_1.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_1.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E022' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_2 ON T.PRDT_MDCL_CD = s002b_2.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_2.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E023' WHERE A.LAST_YN = 'Y' AND A.PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD AND A.FRS_MNGM_BDCD LIKE #{dptCd} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT s702b_2.DPRT_CD FROM IBIMS702B s702b_2 WHERE s702b_2.DPRT_CD = A.FRS_MNGM_BDCD )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS702B WHERE 1=1 AND STDR_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND DPRT_CD = #{dprtCd}
